code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./Admin.css";import logo from"../img/login_logo.png";import{FaTh,FaBars,FaUserAlt,FaRegChartBar,FaCommentAlt}from"react-icons/fa";import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const toggle=()=>setIsOpen(!isOpen);const menuItem=[{path:"/onboarding",name:"Onboarding",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTh,{})},{path:"/about",name:"Gallery",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaUserAlt,{})},{path:"/analytics",name:"Access",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaRegChartBar,{})},{path:"/comment",name:"Log out",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCommentAlt,{})}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{width:isOpen?"200px":"50px"},className:"sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top_section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{display:isOpen?"block":"none"},className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{style:{paddingTop:"14px"},src:logo})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginLeft:isOpen?"50px":"5px"},className:"bars",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaBars,{onClick:toggle})})]}),menuItem.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavLink,{to:item.path,className:"link",activeclassName:"active",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"icon",children:item.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:isOpen?"block":"none"},className:"link_text",children:item.name})]},index))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"top-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"I am The Header"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{children:children})]})]})});};export default Sidebar;
